changeSet.author: daihaodong
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `blog_footer_info` ( `id` bigint auto_increment COMMENT '表ID，主键', `icp_number` VARCHAR(20) COMMENT 'ICP备案号', `police_number` VARCHAR (20) COMMENT '公安备案号', `author` VARCHAR (10) COMMENT '作者', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB COMMENT '博客页脚信息';
